video.title: Marvel's The Punisher
video.synopsis: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

episodes.synopsis: Former Marine Frank Castle takes the law into his own hands while struggling to come to terms with his traumatic past.
episodes.title: 3AM

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious phone call forces Frank's hand. Meanwhile, Madani goes digging for suspects and Curtis delivers a message.
episodes.title: Two Dead Men

episodes.synopsis: Frank skips the subtlety while interrogating Micro. Brutal memories of top-secret missions shed light on Frank's past.
episodes.title: Kandahar

episodes.synopsis: Madani and Sam plan a delicate operation, Curtis tries to connect with Lewis, and Frank encourages Micro to get his hands dirty.
episodes.title: Resupply

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Micro go looking for answers from a reluctant witness. Madani and Sam learn of a looming investigation. Rawlins sees a ghost.
episodes.title: Gunner

episodes.synopsis: With Frank in bad shape, Micro calls on Curtis for help. Madani and Russo continue to mix business with pleasure. Lewis stands up for his rights.
episodes.title: The Judas Goat

episodes.synopsis: Lewis struggles with the ramifications of his actions. Frank and Micro pursue another face from the past. Madani and Sam go bug hunting.
episodes.title: Crosshairs

episodes.synopsis: Russo opens up to Madani about his past, Sarah shares her concerns about her son with Frank, and a decoy operation takes a turn.
episodes.title: Cold Steel

episodes.synopsis: Following a deadly explosion, Karen lands in a bomber's crosshairs -- and Frank isn't happy about it. Meanwhile, Curtis makes a grisly discovery.
episodes.title: Front Toward Enemy

episodes.synopsis: An attack on a high-profile politician is examined (and reexamined) through different perspectives. Madani faces a painful truth.
episodes.title: Virtue of the Vicious

episodes.synopsis: As danger knocks on Sarah's door, Frank takes his quest for vengeance to the next level with some help from an unexpected ally.
episodes.title: Danger Close

episodes.synopsis: Frank makes a damning confession. A shootout leaves Sarah wondering what to believe. Rawlins goes in for the kill, once and for all.
episodes.title: Home

episodes.synopsis: As the authorities close in, an exhausted but unbroken Frank vows to put an end to the war that has consumed his life.
episodes.title: Memento Mori

episodes.synopsis: While driving through Michigan, Frank stops for a beer at a roadside bar. But staying out of trouble has never been his strong suit.
episodes.title: Roadhouse Blues

episodes.synopsis: Frank and a reluctant Rachel go on the run as a menacing adversary gives chase. Meanwhile, Madani pays Russo an unwelcome visit.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: As Pilgrim's past comes into focus, Frank and Rachel find themselves in police custody, where they're anything but safe.
episodes.title: Trouble the Water

episodes.synopsis: Rachel recalls the night everything changed and lets Frank in on the truth about her name. Russo sits down with a face from his childhood.
episodes.title: Scar Tissue

episodes.synopsis: It's not a trap if you know it's coming: That's Frank's philosophy. Madani opens up and Pilgrim plans a visit to an unholy land.
episodes.title: One-Eyed Jacks

episodes.synopsis: Amy (formerly Rachel) develops photographs that point to a conspiracy. Russo reads his own report. Madani's story about Russo comes under fire.
episodes.title: Nakazat

episodes.synopsis: Madani's quest to ID Pilgrim hits a wall. Russo and his crew put their plan into action. Frank encounters someone from the past.
episodes.title: One Bad Day

episodes.synopsis: Painful memories take ahold of Russo. Frank's frustration frightens those closest to him. Madani receives a visitor bearing a warning.
episodes.title: My Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: A big bounty inspires New York's worst to pursue the Punisher. A restless Amy seeks help from a fellow grifter. Russo and Krista consider the future.
episodes.title: Flustercluck

episodes.synopsis: As Madani and Krista debate who's worth saving, Frank prepares to storm Russo's territory. A brutal encounter pushes Pilgrim back into old habits.
episodes.title: The Dark Hearts of Men

episodes.synopsis: Amy rushes to protect Frank, who lies defenseless in a hospital. Pilgrim gets some crushing news, and Karen Page calls in a favor.
episodes.title: The Abyss

episodes.synopsis: Buckle up -- Mahoney and Frank are about to take a ride to remember. Amy makes an entrance, Russo cashes out, and Madani comes clean to Krista.
episodes.title: Collision Course

episodes.synopsis: Frank, Pilgrim, Madani, Russo, Amy, Curt and the Schultz family.  No bullet is left unspent as season two comes to an explosive conclusion.
episodes.title: The Whirlwind
